name: aktech media group
overview:
Aktech media group is a full service internet PR firm specializing in online marketing including custom web development, brand consulting, video production, and more

aktech media creates a complex social media marketing campaign that will help your business gain visibility online using the top social media sites, and communities. We create custom branded blogs, rss feeds, social media profiles, micro blogs, online videos, press releases and a custom online digital business card which acts like your main social media hub. All of this will help achieve an online brand and help you gain control of your search engine results. More people search for your company brand through search engines today than anywhere else, so you need to take control of your results and display all positive PR online. We can do this for you!

Additional services include: website development video production email marketing text message marketing graphic design full service marketing internet PR campaigns
